topic.body:

他是谁？
他就是——马斯克，

topic.title: The Restoration of America  — The Dawn of A New Civilization! 重振美国、振兴中华
topic.body:
The Restoration of America 
— The Dawn of A New Civilization!
重振美国、振兴中华
— 新文明征程!


1) The essence of American vitality 
"Make America Great Again!" 
It’s not just a slogan belonging to President Trump only. It’s a public consensus supported by the whole USA nation, also by the majority of mankind who firmly support the fundamental essence of modern civilization — a Purified Civilization initially launched up by the Puritans centuries ago, who upgraded the medieval Christendom into modern civilization, by setting up a clearly-defined constitution that firmly protects human rights by gun rights.   

The secret why the USA can keep sustainable vitality is not two-party competition or checked balance system, but is a Purified Faith in human civilization which respects God, respects the human rights of individuals, and more importantly, protects such principle with constitutional rule of gun rights.  

Before the Purified culture with gun rights system is destroyed, it is impossible for any one to realize their attempt to overthrow the whole USA federation, including the notorious atheism gang from East Asia, which is described by Steve Bannon as a country with "incalculable power". 

American system is not perfect yet. There're loopholes, which may be infiltrated by the atheism dictatorship virus from East Asia by various secret means.  Accumulation of those secret infiltrations can pose big threat against the security of the whole federation. 

No matter how imperfect the current system is, the USA still keeps leading influence of human civilization. When the whole nation is awakened up by the accumulated infiltrations from the atheism gang, American whole system will react vigorously, to fight back the evil forces, to protect the bottom line of justice.  One prominent example is related to the former BAI(Beijing Intelligence Agent) Guo Wen Gui whose open identity is a real estate businessman ( http://www.washingtonexaminer.com/china-reportedly-used-us-casino-magnate-and-gop-fundraiser-steve-wynn-to-lobby-trump-and-it-almost-worked/article/2638366 ). 

President Trump is good at trading anything, but can be timely prevented from trading justice, which is the soul of American value. 

Indian Saint Mahatma Gandhi once said, "All compromise is based on give and take, but there can be no give and take on fundamentals. Any compromise on mere fundamentals is a surrender. For it is all give and no take." - 

There is an over-crazy environment of ecommerce which tends to make any tangible thing as "tradable", with an evil attempt of creating money worship to replace the holy purified civilization which respects both God and individual dignity. Despite such crazy environment, many top-rank elite in the USA keep good common sense of the basic principle on justice, as is shown in the above typical case. 

2) The Dark War — Concerns about New Cold War 
2.1) New Cold War or Dark War? 

Based on the inside secrets disclosed by the former BIA 
( https://www.rfa.org/mandarin/zhuanlan/xinlingzhilyu/dayangliangan/mind-10092017172828.html ) , there's a BGY Infiltration scheme which aimed to control prominent figures in both the East and the West through various means, including bribery, lucrative business stimulation and blackmail by scandal maneuver;  furthermore, there’s a 3F scheme focused on destroying the USA system by all possible means so as to frustrate the efficiency of the leading civilization.   

So concerns arise, with experts discussing about the New Cold War between major powers.

However, the New Cold War will be surely be ended quickly, since the features of both BGY and 3F schemes show that the atheism regime in China mainly operate based on collusion of crimes, money lure and intimation by scandal traps against some prominent figures in the society, which means none of the spies choose to work for the atheism gang based on voluntary choice of the so-called "communism" ideal which was once proclaimed by them to be "glorious and holy", but was not believed by any one of themselves!    

Instead of the New Cold War, BGY and 3F schemes are in fact a new form of war — a Dark War which was started nearly 20 years ago after the Tian An Men Incident in 1989, and aimed to corrode the whole USA system by various secret means, which can't operate openly and may paralyze easily upon exposure in light.  

2.2) To End the Dark War 
To fight back against the Dark War, the most efficient way is to expose all those crimes in light.  A typical crime by the atheism gang is the man-made disaster of Malaysian Airline MH370 Incident, which not only killed family members of professional doctors who helped with organ harvesting in order to save the top-rank masters of the atheism gang, but also killed many top-rank Beijing Intelligence Agents who know too much of the inside stories of the atheism gang!  

Inspired by the USA's strategic adjustment, more and more people are enlightened up by the bright course which will Make America Great Again, with despair replaced by hope! 

Despite the panic among the atheism regime which made them tighten their control of the cyberspace in mainland, China, the number of cyberspace activists rose quickly from hundreds up to dozens of thousands, and still rising on the way with more and more people joining in the bright course voluntarily.  They’re spreading not only the truth, but also a new era of civilization!  

The rising troop of cyberspace volunteers include people from all walks of life. Many of them are from Family Church Association (Family Church is often called as "Underground Church" in the atheism China, since the physical expansion of church is curbed down by tightened procedures of censorship, people seeking God, seeking Truth have to gather through unregistered, private family churches).   

By integrating the shocking truth, the bright course of a new civilization is spreading quickly, with overwhelming influence.  

Some teenagers are too angry to keep calm, they expressed their rage openly and were beaten by the secret police brutally; which could not be stopped for the time being, for some awakened police officer who now begin to hate the atheism system also see that before the jungle dictatorship system is converted into modern civilization, no one is secure, including the dictators themselves.

In view of the special circumstances, experienced technicians are actively working on a new way of message delivery based on uncensored, decentralized P2P network which was originally developed by BitCoin Technology.  

  2.3) Global Enemy — The Fake-Communism Dictatorship 

The cyberspace has somehow become a battlefield. Fortunately, the cyberspace activists are not alone, since more and more well-educated netizens join in the campaign voluntarily.  More importantly, at the international stage, though Chinese people suffer the bitterest disaster caused by the atheism regime, due to USA’s leading influence with strategic adjustment at a critical stage of history, more and more governments and institutions in other parts of the world are awakened by the necessity to fight against the spreading of the atheism dictatorship virus.  

This is a very inspiring trend of civilization, which not only helps volunteers conquer many obstacles, but also attract more and more volunteers to join in the bright course, since the bright course not only stands for justice, but also attracts the majority of mankind, which itself indicates that victory surely belongs to the just course, and the dawn of a new civilization is coming nearer and nearer! 

More and more incidents show that the so-called Confucius Institutes are actually a disguised tool for spreading atheism dictatorship virus.  Senator Rubio and other top-rank elite in the USA make efficient decisions to contain the abnormal expansion of Confucius Institute.   

There’re many other exposures of the atheism virus, such as fake democracy advocator exposed — a man named "李伟东" cheated nearly USD300,000.00 annually from American fund for democracy.  But that guy is actually a spy who worked for the atheism gang, and used all those money for the destruction of USA federation.

Such phenomenon might be tolerated by the former USA administration in the past. But things are different now.  Even President Trump can't neglect the voice of justice, so in the new circumstances that aim to Make America Great again, active efforts should be made in order to let some democracy institutions support the right course which complies with the American value.

The repeated activities of history have show that, common sense of justice may be more important than splendid political slogans!  

In the atheism-gang-dictatorship China, there’re organized terrorism crimes that occur frequently, from organ harvesting to oppression of Christendom, with conscientious Christian associates pronounced to be guilty for their good deeds on rescuing orphans, which is termed as a crime of “buying popularity” that may impact the miserable confidence of the fake-communism dictatorship.   
(the url of true story https://www.rfa.org/cantonese/news/priest-01062017084816.html ) 

In the fake-communism-dictatorship China, there’re some very unimaginable absurdities, such as destruction of Church Cross, hanging of the notorious Blood-Red Flag over the holy Church Cross with an evil attempt to satisfy those non-confident atheism officials' dirty aspiration for proof of their authority that the holy Church is now obedient under the leadership by those vicious gang masters who are not even communists either, for one simple logic, the word "communism" itself has the connotation of "equality on wealth", yet it’s ridiculous that a small group of atheism gang masters who dare not disclose their personal wealth to their own people now proclaim that they have high confidence, with the holy Church Cross also obedient to their greedy dictatorship of power!  

President Trump often emphasizes the absurdities of " fake news" and "fake media". Such emphasis is necessary, for it’s indeed ridiculous that some traditional medias choose to overlook those simplest absurdities and pretend not to see a simple logic — under those unimaginable appearances of fake-"communism" confidence which is as greedy as to make God obedient to the Atheism Gang, how many crimes are covered?  

As to those traditional medias who pretend to be blind, are they affected by the atheism gang's BGY and 3F schemes? Are they betrayers of the American value? 

At a critical stage of history, righteous and wise people should often reflect upon such phenomena. 

The former Chinese democracy leader Liu Xiao Bo (刘*晓*波) once said, "we’re not the enemy of the communist party” (我们不是中国*共*产*党的敌人). 

These words are partially correct, but it’s not crystal clear enough. For one simple logic, the small group of the atheism gang leaders even dare not to disclose their own wealth to the Community of their own people, to the Community of their own party members, which are proclaimed to have dozens of millions of members, how can they have the authority to represent a true communism, or a true communist party?  

They are nothing, but just a small group of atheism gang!  

So the actual enemy of true democracy advocators is just a small group of atheism gang leaders. That small group of the atheism gang leaders are not only the enemy of justice, they are now being hated by an increasing number of ordinary Chinese people; and furthermore, they are becoming the biggest shame of the Communist Party itself, which was once the largest organization in the world, but now with no one believing in the organization, which may quickly collapse at any moment. 

More dramatically, due to the over-confidence that their party-flag hung over the Church cross symbolizing that the atheism gang have made God obedient to them, such crazy arrogance finally becomes the last straw that breaks the camel's back. 

With wide-spreading exposure of crimes by the atheism gang, the majority of civilized world is awakened up by the necessity to fight back against the atheism dictatorship virus! 

The term "Fake-Communism Dictatorship" might not be used by other people in the past to describe the atheism gang in mainland China.  But one broad common sense is that the atheism gang controlled China is NOT a republic, with none of the party's representatives elected by Chinese people ( as is emphasized by the well-known program — 'Death By China: How America Lost Its Manufacturing Base"  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mMlmjXtnIXI ) 

3) The Phenomenon of Guo Wen Gui’s Revenge 

Steve Bannon may describe China as a country with "incalculable power" so as to better show his talent of politics on how to compete with "incalculable power".   

But the atheism gang’s powerfulness is only superficial. Domestically, the gang’s dictatorship confidence mainly relies on "Real-Name Verification System of Choppers" (菜刀实名制), which was very difficult to understand by Chinese people as well, not to mention foreigners. After the BIA Guo Wen Gui’s exposure of crimes going in Xin Jiang everyday, now it’s understandable that the gang is afraid that choppers going freely at markets may result in raged Uygur people's rebellion with choppers, while the atheism gang's mercenary troops are no longer willing to dedicate their lives just for a few dictators' pleasures.  

On high-tech aspect, there's no chance to exceed the USA's leading technology. The thing that can be done is the Dark War — secret infiltration through any means, including the BGY, 3F schemes. 

No matter how sophisticated their plan is. The jungle nature of the atheism regime remains the same. 

The internal struggle among the atheism regime, which is without any bottom line of conscience, finally goes out of control, with former BIA Guo Wen Gui who has no choice but to defect the gang, choose justice, in order to protect himself and his family members. 

The prominent features of Guo Wen Gui's revenge include below points:
3.1) The Dross to be Discarded 
With nearly all of his family members suffering bitter torture by the atheism gang, Guo Wen Gui still insists on obedience with the puppet ruler Emperor Xi whom he praised as A Great Emperor in one thousand years (千年圣君)。 Such phenomena show that China's long history of dictatorship mainly relies on the "Eunuch Dross" which are skillfully hidden in some of Confucious ideology that emphasizes obedience without principles. 

Confucious obedience ideology may work well in the past when many people were illiterate.  

As part of the 3F scheme aimed to destroy the USA civilization, the stopped Confucious Institute was involved to export "Eunuch Dross" from the atheism China into the USA, in order to paralyze people’s common sense of justice. 

3.2) New Possibilities 
As a man with middle school education, real life in the USA certainly helped improve his consciousness of individual’s human rights.  Despite some tint of "Eunuch Dross" in his mentality, Guo Wen Gui conquered the fear imposed upon him by the atheism gang, and openly fought back. 

The special tint of "Eunuch Dross" may be a special tactic by him in order to paralyze the arrogant atheism gang? Some observers like to explain in this way, yet it's highly possible that the "Eunuch Dross" may be totally discarded finally, since America is a land of opportunities for all beings to constantly improve themselves! 

As a businessman without much political sensitivity, Guo Wen Gui may need some time to see the trend of development, that some adjustment may be needed, with the slogan of "Not Oppose Emperor Xi" replaced by "To Resume Constitutional Democracy in China", since a broad sense of Constitutional Democracy is much more important than being restrained on a narrow topic on the appropriateness of "To Oppose or Not To Oppose" certain politician or puppet ruler. 
(以恢复宪政的整体概念取代反对/不反对某个具体政客，具有最广泛的正义诉求意义！)

Though there are things that need improvement, the ongoing incident of Guo Wen Gui's Revenge is a great phenomenon with great symbolic significance!  

The majority of netizens in China have similar education level as Guo Wen Gui. Guo Wen Gui’s Revenge indicates that most of ordinary people are clearly aware of the importance of individual’s human rights. Even if the Dictator Mao Tse Dong went onto stage once more in contemporary China, there'd be no chance for them to resume another Cultural Revolution that destroys the nation. 

Based on all these inspiring facts, more and more people see the prospect of a peaceful revolution coming nearer and nearer.  It’s the dawn of a new civilization!

顺便加个汉语说明：
既然枪支的火药来自于中华文明，因此重振美国就是“振兴中华”，真正的中华文明，在海外才有 —— 美国文化是吸收了中华文明之后，反而比赵宋王朝更加规范地传承了儒家文化的“核心理念”，与“己所不欲、勿施于人”的普世原则相对应的，是对自由的规范—正当的自由是“不侵犯别人的同等权利的自由”(freedom without violation of other people's equal rights)。

没有“持枪权” 的民主自由是跛脚的，容易被希特勒、斯大林、麦卡锡等政客们颠覆。真正的普世价值需要“持枪权捍卫真理”的“普世原则”来保驾护航，在郭文贵乱象引起越来越多人们关注的时代，希望中华文明在重振美国的文明征程上重返东亚大陆，坚守“持枪权捍卫真理”的“普世原则”，推动世界的持久和平！

**[香港和大陆联合起来！洗雪国耻，重振中华！ ](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1FEZMirRLiZPx6xXL7G7Cg7tCHNVwG798r/?Post:13)**

topic.title: 和平革命三部曲
topic.body:
(比较繁忙的朋友，看看摘要、革命檄文和说明C部分，就可以。)

摘要：
和平革命三部曲：
1) 标语革命 —抛弃伪共，恢复宪政！
把反对目标界定为一小撮“伪共”“黄俄蛆”，与基层党员无关！这有利于最大化地减少潜在的冲突，促进和平革命。 
2) 独立工会革命 — 扎根本地的工会、维权联盟比频繁地进京维权更实在，符合长远之道！
3) 民变和兵变 — 恢复选举，恢复宪政！是彻底保障退伍老兵利益的长远之道。
额外说明：
a) 郭文贵病毒 —砸烂太监糟粕，是为了更好地促进郭文贵维权。
b) 文明转型 — 和平革命的终极目标，恢复中华文明，“持枪权捍卫真理”的“普世原则”。 
c) 营救董瑶琼符合“重振美国”的战略，更是在维护“自由女神”！

+ **前言—革命檄文**
 详情见：
...... 
http://127.0.0.1:43110/zybbs.bit/?Topic:5_1KjezDT16Z47VxZasHVX4LLTb91h94FKXg

topic.title: A small test ….
topic.body:
It's the eve of Spring Festival. 
Many people are witnessing the coldest winter in the past dozens of years. 
After the brutal cold winter season, spring will come with everything warmed up. 
At the unusual beginning of 2021, wish everybody peace and good health! 

A special greeting card is uploaded in two ways: 
one is displayed as content of message, 
http://127.0.0.1:43110/168x9d56MSBjrq6TYoDaSvxXSux3nPzw37/?Topic:4_1KjezDT16Z47VxZasHVX4LLTb91h94FKXg/An+unusual+Spring+Festival

If those particles won't break through the brain barrier, then what problems resulted in the serious symptoms that
  **the infected people can no longer detect smells and taste** ?   

This issue should be studied by more scientists.  
The above short essay was produced by a retired scientist, whose major was not in medical sector.  However, he's very curious mind about how the brain controls one’s action.  At the severe situation of global pandemics, he chose to spend much time on the research of why people infected with the disease can lose smell and taste …  

Hope more professionals can join in the topics.
